derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: formed irregularly from system + -ic

entry.tran: 系统的;影响全面的;全身的
entry.def: Systemic means affecting the whole of something.

example.ex: The economy is locked in a systemic crisis.

entry.def: Systemic chemicals or drugs are absorbed into the whole of an organism such as a plant or person, rather than being applied to one area.
